full_summary:
# CIACS6 Gen II and Ancillary Equipment Tender Announcement

**Title:** CIACS6 Gen II and Ancillary Equipment Tender Announcement
**Reference Number:** PW-22-01006375
**Solicitation Number:** W8485-237343/A

**Publication Date:** September 7, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** October 6, 2022, 14:00:00 EST

**Tender Description:**
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a contract for the procurement of CIACS6 Gen II and ancillary equipment. The contract includes the following items:

* Vest, Survival, Part No.: CIACS6/2-M-MS-FCCA, NSN: 01-591-3566, Quantity: 50
* Vest, Survival, Part No.: CIACS6/2-L-MS-FCCA, NSN: 01-591-3567, Quantity: 50
* Vest, Survival, Part No.: CIACS6/2-S-MS-FCCA, NSN: 01-591-3557, Quantity: 20
* Pocket, Ammunition Magazine, Part No.: MP1-M4/2-A-MS-FCCA, NSN: 01-615-8922, Quantity: 150
* Carrier, Grenade, Part No.: FGC-1-A-MS-FCCA, NSN: 01-615-8930, Quantity: 150

**Delivery Requirement:**
All items must be delivered to the Canadian Forces Supply Depots (CFSD) in Montreal, Quebec by December 15, 2022.

**Notice:**
Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, bidders are strongly encouraged to transmit their bids electronically using the epost Connect service instead of traditional methods.

**Specifications:**
Bidder proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the National Coding Goods Identification (NCAGE) number for the offered product.

**Submission Methods:**
Documents may be submitted in either French or English, and bids may be transmitted electronically or through traditional methods.

**Contracting Entity:**
Department of National Defence
101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2
**Contact Information:**
Danny Lebel
Dany Lebel2@forces.gc.ca

**Attachement:**
Bid solicitation documents are available on the Canada Buy Service (CBSC) website.
